floor_plans.title: Title of the floor plan being displayed
floor_plans.original_url: URL of the floor plan image that you wish to display. We will take a copy of this and resize as required. We then serve copies of these images.

virtual_tours.title: Title of the virtual tour being displayed
virtual_tours.original_url: URL of the virtual tour that you wish to display. We do not host these and will link to them, or embed them within the advert display.
